Food's already scarce, but you have to watch your portions as well!

- Food and the horn of plenty are one third as effective at satisfying hunger
- Other sources of satiety are unaffected
取得徽章：%s:
食物本就稀缺，但你还需要注意节食！

-使用各类食物与丰饶之角的饱腹效果为原本的三分之一
-其他恢复饥饿的机制不受影响

You'll need faith in yourself, as your armor won't do much!

- Base blocking power reduced for all armor except cloth
- All armor now gains very little blocking when upgraded
- Earthen guardian's defensive power is also significantly reduced
取得徽章：%s:
如今护甲已难堪大用，你只能相信你自己的肉身了！

-布甲之外所有护甲的基本防御力降低
-所有护甲升级提供的防御力成长大幅降低
-灵壤守卫的防御力大幅降低

Healing potions sure are handy, unfortunately you're allergic!

- Potions of healing, items that use potions of healing in their recipe, and sunfruit will poison the hero instead of healing them
- Unstable brews cannot randomly poison or heal the hero
- These items still work normally for other characters.
取得徽章：%s:
治疗药剂真是种好东西，可惜你对它过敏！

-治疗药剂、以治疗药剂为原料炼制的道具与阳春果将无法治愈英雄，反而会使英雄中毒
-紊乱魔药不会随机到治愈英雄或使英雄中毒的效果
-这些道具对其他单位依然发挥正常效果。

There seems to be no clean water left in this accursed dungeon...

- Dew drops are removed
- Plants are removed
- Seeds still appear, but will not take root
取得徽章：%s:
这个晦气的地牢里连干净的水都没有了...

-移除露珠
-移除所有特殊植物
-高草依然会掉落种子，但种子不会生根发芽

Watch out, the dungeon monsters are getting smarter!\n\n- When an enemy notices you, nearby enemies are drawn to that location
取得徽章：%s: 要小心了，地牢里的怪物们也在学习进步！\n\n-当你被敌人发现时，附近的其他敌人也会被吸引到那里。

It is a dungeon after all!

- Regular visible distance dramatically reduced
- A torch appears on each floor
- Other light sources are 1/5 as effective
取得徽章：%s:
地牢毕竟是在地下嘛！

-正常视野范围显著缩小
-每层都会出现一根火把
-其他光源有效性降至1/5

A certain rune is harder to find. Unfortunately, it's always the most useful one.\n\n- Half of the dungeon's upgrade scrolls are removed
取得徽章：%s: 一种卷轴会变得更稀有。不幸的是，总是最有用的那一种。\n\n-移除地牢中半数的升级卷轴

You're not the only one who can level up!

- Regular enemies have a 1/8 chance to spawn with a special champion buff
- Champions wake up if they spawn asleep
- The hero knows when a champion spawns
- Champions are immune to corruption

There are six types of champion enemy:
_Blazing (orange):_ +25% melee damage, ignites on hit, spreads flames on death, can't ignite water tiles
_Projecting (purple):_ +25% melee damage, +3 melee range
_Antimagic (green):_ -50% damage taken, immune to magical effects
_Giant (blue):_ -80% damage taken, +1 melee range, cannot move into tunnels
_Blessed (yellow):_ 4x accuracy and evasion
_Growing (red):_ +20% accuracy, evasion, damage, and effective HP. Increases by 1% every 4 turns.
取得徽章：%s:
道高一尺魔高一丈，变强可不是你的特权！

-普通敌人刷出时有1/8的概率拥有特殊的精英属性
-精英敌人刷出时会立即醒来
-有精英敌人出现时英雄会感知到
-精英敌人免疫腐化效果

精英敌人有六种：
_烈焰(橙色)：_近战伤害+25%且带有点燃效果，死亡时引燃周围，无法点燃含水地块
_索敌(紫色)：_近战伤害+25%，近战范围+3
_敌法(绿色)：_受到伤害-50%，拥有魔法免疫
_巨型(蓝色)：_受到伤害-80%，近战范围+1，无法进入门与过道
_天佑(黄色)：_精准与闪避x4
_成长(红色)：_精准、闪避、攻击伤害与有效生命值+20%，且每过4回合会再增长1%

Bosses are much tougher with this challenge!

_Goo:_ +20% health
_-_ Healing in water ramps up, to 3/turn
_-_ Pumps up in 1 turn instead of 2
_Tengu:_ +25% health
_-_ Phase 1: traps are much deadlier
_-_ Phase 2: abilities are more frequent
_DM-300:_ +33% health
_-_ Pylons are tougher and 3 activate
_-_ Abilities are more powerful and frequent
_-_ DM-300 is faster when supercharged
_-_ Exposed wires are twice as common
_Dwarf King:_ +50% health
_-_ Minions are stronger in all phases
_-_ Phase 1: faster abilities and summons
_-_ Phase 2: 2 more minions per round
_-_ Phase 3: 2x health, faster summons
_Yog-Dzewa:_
_-_ Two fists are summoned at a time!
_-_ +60% laser damage
_-_ Stronger minions
取得徽章：%s:
这项挑战会让所有Boss都更具挑战性！

_粘咕：_生命值+20%
_-_持续处于水中时，生命回复量递增，最高至每回合3点
_-_爆发攻击蓄力时间由2回合缩短至1回合
_天狗：_生命+25%
_-_第一阶段：陷阱更加致命
_-_第二阶段：技能频率更高
_DM-300：_生命+33%
_-_能量塔更坚固，并且需要击毁3座
_-_技能频率更高，威力也更强大
_-_超载时移动速度更高
_-_地表导线数量为原先的两倍
_矮人国王：_生命+50%
_-_所有阶段中都会召唤更多强力随从
_-_第一阶段：更高的技能与召唤频率
_-_第二阶段：每轮额外召唤两名随从
_-_第三阶段：生命值+100%，进一步提高召唤频率
_Yog-Dzewa：_
_-_同时召唤两个古神之拳！
_-_激光攻击伤害+60%
_-_召唤更强大的随从
成功携带护符回到地面！
